guide.title: How to deposit funds from {{ cex }}
guide.binance.steps: On Binance, go to Assets / Withdraw section.
Select which asset to transfer (currently supported: DOT, USDT, USDC).
Enter your deposit address on Hydration.
Select the correct network (it should be preselected automatically).
For DOT, the network should be Polkadot or Asset Hub.
For USDT and USDC, the network should be Statemint (Asset Hub).
guide.kucoin.steps: On KuCoin, go to Assets / Funding Account / Withdraw.
Select which asset to transfer (currently supported: DOT, USDT, USDC).
Enter your deposit address on Hydration.
For DOT, the network should be Polkadot.
For USDT and USDC, the network should be Asset Hub.
guide.gateio.steps: On Gate.io, go to Assets /  Funds Management / Withdraw / Onchain.
Select which asset to transfer (currently supported: DOT, USDT, USDC).
Enter your deposit address on Hydration.
For DOT, the network should be Polkadot.
For USDT and USDC, the network should be Polkadot/DOTSM.
guide.kraken.steps: On Kraken, go to Transfers / Withdraw.
Select which asset to transfer (currently supported: DOT or HDX).
Enter your deposit address on Hydration.
guide.coinbase.steps: On Coinbase, go to Trading / Wallet Balance / Withdraw.
Select which asset to transfer (currently supported: DOT).
Enter your deposit address on Hydration.
